# Custom search engines for IE, Firefox, and Chrome

  - [IPFS get from hash](http://ready.to/search/en/?sna=ipfs&prf=https%3A%2F%2Fipfs.io%2Fipfs%2F&des=IPFS%20get%20from%20hash&&in=utf&ou=ono&mod=pn)
  - [Python 2 documentation search](http://ready.to/search/en/?sna=python2&prf=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.python.org%2F2%2Fsearch.html%3Fcheck_keywords%3Dyes%26amp%3Barea%3Ddefault%26amp%3Bq%3D&des=Python%202%20documentation%20search&&in=utf&ou=ono&mod=pn)
  - [Python 3 documentation search](http://ready.to/search/en/?sna=python3&prf=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.python.org%2F3%2Fsearch.html%3Fcheck_keywords%3Dyes%26amp%3Barea%3Ddefault%26amp%3Bq%3D&des=Python%203%20documentation%20search&&in=utf&ou=ono&mod=pn)
  - [MDN web docs](http://ready.to/search/en/?sna=MDN&prf=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fen-US%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D&des=Mozilla%20Developer%20Network%20web%20docs&&in=utf&ou=ono&mod=pn)
  
# FAQ
  
  - [How does one change the search keyword in Firefox?](https://stackoverflow.com/q/30309207/1582182)
  - [Where can I find more search plugins?](http://mycroftproject.com)
